name: Joseph Kennedy
description: Joseph comes from a Journalism and Marketing background, plying his trades in the Environmental and Financial sectors. He fell in love with Crypto in 2017 after being advised to buy MIOTA by a colleague. Joseph is a digital nomad and has been living in different countries around the globe for 6 years.
